T02D1258:282b-1: ga na tsa kra p'u dz'a kra ma /
T02D1258:282b-3: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i mchod pa'i rim pa /
T02D1258:282b-4: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1258:282b-5: tshogs rnams bsags par bya ba dang //
T02D1258:282b-6: bgegs rnams nye bar zhi bya'i phyir //
T02D1258:282b-7: bsod nams mthar thug tshogs 'khor lo //
T02D1258:282b-8: lung dang man ngag gi bzhin bri //
T02D1258:282b-9: de la re zhig dang por lugs dang mthun pa'i
T02D1258:282b-10: tshogs kyi khang bu tsandan la sogs pa'i dris bgos
T02D1258:282b-11: pa yid du 'ong ba'i gnas su /
T02D1258:282b-12: las thams cad pa'i skyes bu lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas chag chag gdab pa dang /
T02D1258:283a-0: phyogs skyong gi gtor ma rgya chen po @283a * //
T02D1258:283a-2: de nas slob dpon spyan drangs la //
T02D1258:283a-3: ji ltar rig ma dang bcas par bzhugs su gsol la //
T02D1258:283a-4: las thams cad pa'i bum pa rgyan dang ldan par
T02D1258:283a-5: byin gyis brlab mchod pa'i bum pa yang ci rigs
T02D1258:283a-6: par bsham mo // de nas rnal 'byor pa pho mo 'du bar 'os pa kun bsogs pa /
T02D1258:283a-7: de dag gis dang por gsol ba gdab ste /
T02D1258:283a-8: khro bo sngon po mdzes pa ste //
T02D1258:283a-9: khyod ni dam tshig yid du 'ong //
T02D1258:283a-10: nor bu rin chen gces bcings pa'i //
T02D1258:283a-11: dbyug pa phyag na bsnams pa ste //
T02D1258:283a-12: bdag ni 'khor ba las bsgral phyir //
T02D1258:283a-13: dpa' bos gnang gis gtong du gsol //
T02D1258:283a-14: rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs dbus su //
T02D1258:283a-15: bzang po'i sgo 'di phye ste thong //
T02D1258:283a-18: las kyi bum pa'i chu sa gtor zhing /
T02D1258:283a-20: de nas gral rim bzhin du bkod nas rdo rje
T02D1258:283a-21: slob dpon la me tog phul la gsol ba gdab
T02D1258:283a-22: / rnal 'byor pa pho mo la yang me tog gtor la bskul bar yang bya'o //
T02D1258:283a-23: de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis lhag pa'i lhar bsgoms te /
T02D1258:283a-24: mos pa tsam gyis kyang lce lag byin gyis brlab /
T02D1258:283a-25: de nas rdo rje dang dril bu yang h'um dang /
T02D1258:283a-27: mngon par rtogs pa brjod de /
T02D1258:283a-28: h'um thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02D1258:283a-29: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1258:283a-30: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02D1258:283a-31: rdo rje snyems pa bdag po'i gtso //
T02D1258:283a-33: aa srid pa'i rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir //
T02D1258:283a-34: ngo bo nyid kyis gdod nas dag / rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' yis //
T02D1258:283a-35: srid pa dam pa mchog tu byed //
T02D1258:283a-36: ma h'a badzra gha nda ho: de nas mchod pa'i
T02D1258:283a-37: khyad par thams cad 'bru gsum gyis byin gyis brlab
T02D1258:283a-38: / de nas snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis /
T02D1258:283a-39: bla ma dam pa dang bcas pa gang yin pa'i lha rnams nam mkha' la bltas la /
T02D1258:283a-40: yon chab dang zhabs bsil dang zhabs khrus phul la /
T02D1258:283a-41: me tog dang sgra snyan gyi bar du rim pas mchod /
T02D1258:283a-42: de nas de nyid lnga pa'am /
T02D1258:283b-0: yan lag bdun pa rgyas bsdus gang yang rung @283b bas mchod pa dang /
T02D1258:283b-2: yi ge brgya pas bzod gsol byas la gshegs su gsol /
T02D1258:283b-3: de nas sh'u n+ya'i sngags kyis stong par bsgoms nas /
T02D1258:283b-4: yi ge h'um gi snang bas dra ba dang ra ba dang sa gzhir bsgoms la /
T02D1258:283b-5: de'i 'og tu 'byung ba rim brtsegs ri rab rin po che bsgoms la /
T02D1258:283b-6: de'i steng du sna tshogs padma'i lte ba la /
T02D1258:283b-7: sna tshogs rdo rje bsams te /
T02D1258:283b-8: de'i lte ba la bhr'um las gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas pa bskyed la /
T02D1258:283b-9: gang rung gi ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te /
T02D1258:283b-11: de nas chang bsrung ba dang byin gyis brlab pa gzhung bzhin du bya'o //
T02D1258:283b-12: yi ge ha dmar po las kha dog sbyangs la /
T02D1258:283b-13: ho: dkar pos dri bsal te /
T02D1258:283b-14: hr'i: mthing gas nus pa bcom nas /
T02D1258:283b-15: bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du gyur par bsams la /
T02D1258:283b-16: de nyid kyi 'od zer gyis bdud rtsi yang bkug ste bstim mo //
T02D1258:283b-17: de nas rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha la so so'i ming nas brjod cing mchod /
T02D1258:283b-18: de'i 'og tu bdud rtsi dang bcas pa'i srin lag gis mandala gru gsum bris la /
T02D1258:283b-19: der bdud rtsi gtor bas zla ba'i gdan phyogs mtshams su gyur par bsam /
T02D1258:283b-20: der ye shes kyi 'khor lor mos pa tsam gyis bsams la bdud rtsis mchod /
T02D1258:283b-21: de nas bdag nyid la mchod de /
T02D1258:283b-22: mtheb srin gyi lce rtse dang /
T02D1258:283b-25: de nas de dag mi dmigs par bsams la /
T02D1258:283b-26: rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor la yon chab la sogs pa'i
T02D1258:283b-27: mchod pa'i yo byad khyad par kun gyis mchod do
T02D1258:283b-29: gang yin pa'i gzhung du bstod pa byas la gshegs su gsol /
T02D1258:283b-30: de nas zhing skyong rnams la gtor ma rgya chen po btang ste /
T02D1258:283b-31: yi ge gsum gyis sbyangs pa dang /
T02D1258:283b-34: mandala thig bzhi btab pas ling tshe dgur byas te /
T02D1258:283b-35: dbus ma la ye shes kyi 'khor lo bsams la /
T02D1258:283b-36: phyogs mtshams la zhing skyong brgyad ma mo sum cu
T02D1258:283b-37: rtsa gnyis dang bcas pa spyan drangs la mchod de
T02D1258:283b-38: / aom shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang //
T02D1258:284a-0: ri bo dang ni ri sul phug / grong @284a * //
T02D1258:284a-1: dang bzhi mdo dag dang ni //
T02D1258:284a-2: khyad par du ni khang stong dang //
T02D1258:284a-3: gdol pa snod dang thang dang ni //
T02D1258:284a-4: khyad par du ni chu la gnas //
T02D1258:284a-5: nag po drag po drag chen po //
T02D1258:284a-6: brgya byin mnyam du bsten pa dang //
T02D1258:284a-7: nag po gtsigs dang mi sdug dang //
T02D1258:284a-9: rgan byed ma dang drag mo dang //
T02D1258:284a-10: mi sdug ma dang au ma dang //
T02D1258:284a-11: rgyal ma rnam par rgyal ma dang //
T02D1258:284a-12: mi thub gzhan gyis mi thub ma //
T02D1258:284a-13: nag mo bzang po nag chen mo //
T02D1258:284a-14: nag sbom ma dang rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1258:284a-15: dbang mo dang ni zla ba mo //
T02D1258:284a-16: drag tu sdang dang 'phyang ba mo //
T02D1258:284a-17: 'phrog ma dang ni mar me ma //
T02D1258:284a-19: drag mo'i gzugs dang gzugs chen mo //
T02D1258:284a-20: mche ba gtsigs dang thod chen ma //
T02D1258:284a-21: thod phreng can dang khva gdong ma //
T02D1258:284a-22: sprul chen ral gri dgra sta can //
T02D1258:284a-23: rdo rje de bzhin gzhu can ma //
T02D1258:284a-24: de bzhin chen mo mkha' 'gro lnga //
T02D1258:284a-25: las kun rjes su sgrub byed ma //
T02D1258:284a-26: de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyag gtso //
T02D1258:284a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen te //
T02D1258:284a-28: rdul med rnal 'byor byin pa mo //
T02D1258:284a-29: rdo rje dbang mo'i bka' yis ni //
T02D1258:284a-30: thams cad ma lus 'dir 'dus shig / aom ka kka dha na /
T02D1258:284a-35: gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya /
T02D1258:284a-36: aa mo gha sa h'um dza: zhes pas bkug la padma'i 'dab ma la gnas par bsams la /
T02D1258:284a-37: mchod pa sngar byin gyis brlabs pa de dbul te /
T02D1258:284a-38: so so'i lce h'um las rdo rjer bsams pa'i spu gu'i 'od kyis drangs te /
T02D1258:284a-41: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02D1258:284a-42: dag cing gsal la zhes pa la sogs pa brjod /
T02D1258:284a-43: de nas smon lam gdab ste /
T02D1258:284a-44: sems can thams cad sdig med cing //
T02D1258:284a-45: sems can thams cad bde gyur cig / gang gi lam nas 'gro ba yis //
T02D1258:284a-46: sangs rgyas nyid dang phrad par shog / ma rgal ba rnams bsgral ba dang //
T02D1258:284a-47: ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol //
T02D1258:284a-48: da lta nyid du rjes brtse bas //
T02D1258:284a-49: rnal 'byor bstan bcos gnas la dgod //
T02D1258:284b-0: ces bya bas @284b bsngo ba byas la gshegs su mi gsol /
T02D1258:284b-1: de nas rnal 'byor pho mo kun lha'i dkyil 'khor du bltas la /
T02D1258:284b-2: dbang po la dri yis mchod /
T02D1258:284b-5: mar mes tshul bzhin mchod la /
T02D1258:284b-6: de'i 'og tu bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'i chang
T02D1258:284b-7: gis mchod de lag pa g-yas par chang bzung nas
T02D1258:284b-8: / g-yon pa rtse gsum par byas la /
T02D1258:284b-9: tshigs su bcad pa 'dis sbyin te /
T02D1258:284b-10: ltos shig mdzes pa dam pa'i chos //
T02D1258:284b-11: 'di la the tshom yod ma yin //
T02D1258:284b-12: bram ze khyi dang gdol ba gsum //
T02D1258:284b-13: rang bzhin gcig tu rtogs pas bza' //
T02D1258:284b-16: 'dod chags dri ma bral ba yis //
T02D1258:284b-17: rin thang med las legs 'ongs chos //
T02D1258:284b-18: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs //
T02D1258:284b-19: de kho na nyid la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02D1258:284b-20: zhes pad kor dang bcas pas blang ngo //
T02D1258:284b-21: 'og ma rnams la drang ba ni 'di skad brjod do //
T02D1258:284b-22: sbyor ba'i dngos grub don du ni //
T02D1258:284b-23: spyod kun de nyid ji bzhin du //
T02D1258:284b-24: rnal 'byor pas ni kun du spyad //
T02D1258:284b-25: ji ltar de bas spyad par bya //
T02D1258:284b-27: de'i 'og tu sha khu dang mar gyis mchod //
T02D1258:284b-28: de nas lha bshos so sor bgrangs la//
T02D1258:284b-29: de dag kun gyis phud bsdus nas //
T02D1258:284b-31: slob dpon gyis cha gnyis su bgos te /
T02D1258:284b-32: cha gcig g-yon gyi phyogs su bzhag la //
T02D1258:284b-33: byin gyis brlabs la dkyil 'khor gyi lha la dbul //
T02D1258:284b-34: cha gcig g-yas su bzhag la byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D1258:284b-35: chos skyong gi gtor mar dbul te /
T02D1258:284b-36: aom aa k'a ro mu kham zhes pa'i sngags kyis mchod /
T02D1258:284b-37: de nas ci bder rol zhing spyad //
T02D1258:284b-39: de nas lha dang phyogs skyong la snang ba nod pa dang /
T02D1258:284b-40: bzod gsol byas te badzra mu: zhes pas gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D1258:284b-41: ye shes lha la yi ge brgya pas bzod gsol
T02D1258:284b-42: byas la badzra mu: zhes pas gshegs su gsol lo
T02D1258:284b-43: // dam tshig gi lha snying gar bsdus la //
T02D1258:284b-44: aom a'a tma di shi h'um zhes bsdu'o //
T02D1258:284b-45: de nas aom sarba du shta na gri hna ga
T02D1258:284b-46: tstsha h'um zhes pas phyi rol gyi lha gshegs su
T02D1258:285a-3: rnal 'byor pho mo'i lhag ma ni phyi rol gyi
T02D1258:285a-4: sha za la sogs pa mi ma yin pa rnams
T02D1258:285a-5: la btang ste / phyi sgor bton la btang ngo //
T02D1258:285a-6: khyim pa'i lhag mam ni khyim de nyid kyi mi ma yin la bsngo'o //
T02D1258:285a-7: lhag ma de lta bu'i skal pa med pa la /
T02D1258:285a-8: slob dpon gyi kha nas bdud rtsi byin no //
T02D1258:285a-9: de nas yon bdag la bkra shis dang smon lam gdab po //
T02D1258:285a-10: de nas gtor ma skyel ba log pa dang /
T02D1258:285a-11: tshogs kyi khang sgor me long dang /
T02D1258:285a-14: chu can gyi zho zan gyis mchod /
T02D1258:285a-15: de nas nang du log nas rnal 'byor pho mo la yang de bzhin mchod par bya'o //
T02D1258:285a-16: ma 'ongs skye bo gang dag tshogs rnams bsags par 'dod pa dang //
T02D1258:285a-17: bslab pa'i lam la zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor pa dag gis //
T02D1258:285a-18: don du dri med lung dang bla ma'i man ngag ltar //
T02D1258:285a-19: ma nor bzung ste bdag dang gzhan la phan phyir bris pa yin //
T02D1258:285a-20: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i rim pa slob dpon nag pos mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1258:285a-22: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po krishna pandi tas mdzad
